body.p: This document is an ongoing work in progress. It contains gaps, inaccuracies, omissions, typos and the occasional outright lie. The intent is to make a handbook giving developers and users correct, detailed, up to date technical content.

dd.p: Ciaran McCreesh, Grant Goodyear, Aaron Walker, Robert Coie, Tom Martin, Paul Varner, Ilya Volynets-Evenbakh, Diego Pettenò, Fernando J. Pereda, Simon Stelling, Alin Dobre, Joseph Jezak, Tim Yamin, Mark Loeser, Petteri Räty, Markos Chandras, Mike Pagano, Julian Ospald, Ulrich Müller

body.p: Contributions are encouraged. See the section for how to get started. If you have any corrections, suggestions or improvements please look at the bug list and file a new bug. The section lists specific contributions to this manual.
Users that are interested in becoming a Gentoo Developer are encouraged to also read the Gentoo Developer Handbook.
